name: Emily M. Hand
content: Emily Hand Emily Hand Assistant ProfessorComputer Science and Engineering Home Research Teaching Publications/CV I am an Assistant Professor in the Computer Science and Engineering Department of the University of Nevada, Reno. I received my Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and Engineering and Bachelor of Science in Applied Mathematics from the University of Nevada, Reno in 2013. Under the supervision of Professor Rama Chellappa, I received my Master of Science in 2015 and my Ph.D. in Computer Science in May of 2018. Contact Email: emhand at unr.edu Office: Palmer Engineering 223 Mail: Department of Computer Science and Engineering MS 171 Scrugham Engineering and Mines, University of Nevada, Reno Reno, NV, 89557 Webpage made by Emily Hand
